fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
**A Deal With God** â€” Choose a player during the day. The following night, you and that player will be placed into a night chat titled #a-deal-with-god. Your target may decide at the end of the night to accept the deal with god. If they accept, you will become their role, and they will become a Neutral Other role of their choice, excluding this one.. This chat is cleared after every night a player declines your offer.
- Choose a player at night. You will learn their exact role bypassing any form of detection immunity.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may only learn one player's true role.
- The player who accepts your deal must become a Neutral Other role that is actually a role. They may not become a role that instantly rerolls into an entirely different role. If they choose a role that aligns with a particular faction, it **must **align with their previous faction.
- If the player who accepts your deal comes from a minority faction and outs their old team members, they will be modkilled and instantly lose the game regardless of any future events. Exceptions can be made if they do this in a way deemed fair by the host.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Successfully make a deal with god and fulfill your new win condition.
